task.title: Adding New Members
task.shortdesc: Project administrators and project editors can add new users to projects.

info.p: This is located under the Project members column on the right side of the project dashboard.

step.cmd: Enter the CWRC user name of the person you would like to add.

info.p: In this form you can also send them a “Welcome message” and define the CWRC role within the project. Only project administrators can add additional project admin members.
